data.actual_result: It copies the proxy signed URL
data.expected_result: It should be the imgur link (if you posted one)
data.short_description: When right clicking on an externally embedded image that's expanded, it will copy the proxy signed URL rather than the original link
data.steps_to_repro: - Post a link to an image from a third party, i.e imgur - Open the image with left click - Right click then "Copy link" - Observe the link
